name: Shaq-Fu
overview: Shaq brings his awesome skill and size to a multiworld fighting game! As Shaq, use your lightning-fast shuriken and other martial art techniques to prevail over 11 intensely evil warriors in the enforcement of justice. Or choose any of the 12 warriors and fight head to head. Summon Voodoo's bone-shattering earthquake, rebound with Rajah's shockwave sword or lash out with Sett's terrifying mummy wrap! Scores of secret power moves to discover and master!
